resources.string:
Rule For Winning Game : 
	Player Who Will Earn Greater ThanOr Equal To 100 Points Will Be Considered As Winner. 

 Procedure For Online Playing : 

	 Step 1 : 

	First You Have to Create A Unique Game ID . The Unique Game ID Is Already There, You Can Use That ID . You Can Use Your Own Also , But It Should Be Unique. Remember That, ID Should Be Unique From All The Users . You Should Enter Guided ID , To Avoid Any Inconsistency . 

Step 2: 

	After You Got Unique ID, Then You Register That ID On our Server . Thus, Your Side Game Will Be Started .
 
Step 3: 

Then Share Game ID With Your Opponent And Ask Him/Her To Put That ID In ID Box And Click On Join. 


 Now You Can Play As Many Of Games As You Want . If You Move Back From Online Screen Your Progress Will Be Lost And You Have To Regenererate Another Game ID . "
